description: Enemies' {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence} (whichever is highest) is set to its minimum value. Then, afflict each enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}, depending on whether their {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence} was unaffected. This spell is an {SPELL_ultimate}.
name: Peace
